# HOQCwfs

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

R Web Feature Service (WFS) read-only interface

## Installation

You can install this version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("HanOostdijk/HOQCwfs")
```
